name: Pokemon Go Fest Chicago 2019
description: Explore Pokemon habitats within Chicago's iconic Grant Park with thousands of Trainers from around the world. Attend Pokemon GO Fest 2019 on Thursday June 13th, Friday June 14th, Saturday June 15th, or Sunday June 16th. All days will offer the same enhanced experience but you can only choose one.

name: Research Breakthroughs - May-June
description: Lugia, Ho-Oh, Latias, and Latios will be Research Breakthrough encounters starting May 1, 2019, at 1 p.m. PDT (GMT −7) through the end of June.

name: Pokemon Go Fest Dortmund 2019
description: Explore Pokemon habitats within Dortmund's iconic Westfalenpark with thousands of Trainers from around the world. Attend Pokemon GO Fest 2019 on Thursday July 4th, Friday July 5th, Saturday July 6th, or Sunday July 7th. All days will offer the same enhanced experience but you can only choose one.

name: Community Day - June 2019
description: Get out and play together in your local community parks on Pokemon GO Community Day. For just a few hours each month, you can encounter a special Pokemon in the wild. During these hours, there's a chance to learn a previously unavailable move for that Pokemon or its Evolution, as well as earn some Community Day bonuses. Celebrate what it means to be a part of the Pokemon GO community and make new friends along the way!

name: A legendary return - Cresselia reawakens in raids!
description:
Trainers,

We hope you're enjoying Extraordinary Raid Week so far! We're excited to announce the next three Legendary Pokémon you can look forward to seeing in five-star Raid Battles. Expect to see some Legendary Pokemon return—riled up and ready to battle!

**Cresselia**
This Psychic-type Legendary Pokemon is said to represent the crescent moon, but don't let its graceful exterior lull you during battle. Psychic-type Pokemon are weak against Bug-, Ghost-, and Dark-type Pokemon, so be sure to have those ready!

This is your chance to catch Cresselia! It'll be tough, but we have faith in you, Trainers. Legendary Pokemon only appear when the time is right—this must be fate. Are you ready to be a Battle Legend? Show us what you've got!
bonuses: If the workings of the cosmos are in your favor, you may encounter a Shiny Cresselia!

name: A legendary return - Kyogre reawakens in raids!
description:
Trainers,

We hope you're enjoying Extraordinary Raid Week so far! We're excited to announce the next three Legendary Pokémon you can look forward to seeing in five-star Raid Battles. Expect to see some Legendary Pokemon return—riled up and ready to battle!

**Kyogre**
The Sea Basin Pokemon is said to have widened the seas and waged battle with Groudon. This Water-type Pokemon is weak against Grass- and Electric-type Pokemon. Can you earn this powerful creature's trust and convince it to battle alongside you?

This is your chance to catch Kyogre! It'll be tough, but we have faith in you, Trainers. Legendary Pokemon only appear when the time is right—this must be fate. Are you ready to be a Battle Legend? Show us what you've got!
bonuses: Fortune favors the bold—you may encounter a Shiny Kyogre!

name: A legendary return - Groudon reawakens in raids!
description:
Trainers,

We hope you're enjoying Extraordinary Raid Week so far! We're excited to announce the next three Legendary Pokémon you can look forward to seeing in five-star Raid Battles. Expect to see some Legendary Pokemon return—riled up and ready to battle!

**Groudon**
Groudon is said to have dueled titanically with Kyogre before falling into a deep slumber. It's a Ground-type Pokemon, so, Trainers, this means Water-, Grass-, and Ice-type Pokemon are your best bets for defeating this powerful opponent!

This is your chance to catch Groudon! It'll be tough, but we have faith in you, Trainers. Legendary Pokemon only appear when the time is right—this must be fate. Are you ready to be a Battle Legend? Show us what you've got!
bonuses: Keep persevering, Trainer—you may encounter a Shiny Groudon!

name: Adventure Week makes an earth-shattering return!
description:
Pack your bags and lace up your hiking boots-it's almost Adventure Week! The groundbreaking event returns this year, bigger and better than ever. Keep your eyes peeled for new Shiny Pokemon to discover, limited-time Field Research, and rewards for exploring new areas with your Buddy Pokemon!

Embrace your hiker spirit, Trainers! You never know what you and your Buddy Pokemon might find. Join this adventure before it ends on June 11. Get up and GO!

fieldResearch.name: Adventure Week 2019: Evolve a Lileep or Anorith
Adventure Week 2019: Spin 2 PokeStops you haven't visited before
Adventure Week 2019: Earn 3 Candies walking with your buddy
Adventure Week 2019: Catch 5 Omanyte or Kabuto

bonuses: Earn 4x Buddy Candy (Tip: Turn on Adventure Sync to make every step count!)
Visit new PokeStops and earn 10x XP on your first spin of each Photo Disc
Trainers who have Adventure Sync activated and walk 50 km will earn 50,000 Stardust and 15 Rare Candies!
Specially themed Field Research tasks will be available for a limited time during this event.

name: Legendary Raid Hour - Cresselia
description:
Thank you for your feedback on our experimental Legendary Raid Hours over the past few months. We’re excited to announce that there will be more Legendary Raid Hours taking place in June!

For one hour every Wednesday evening, Raid Battles with the currently featured Legendary Pokémon will appear in greater numbers. Mark your calendars!

As always, Trainers, be mindful of your surroundings and others around you while playing Pokémon GO. Stay tuned for more updates.
bonuses: There will be an increased number of ★★★★★ raids during the event hour.
